concepts.title: C Major Scale
concepts.shortDescription: Learn the basic C major scale.
concepts.longDescription: C major has 7 white keys: C D E F G A B.
concepts.subject: Music

concepts.title: G Major Scale
concepts.shortDescription: Learn the G major scale (one sharp).
concepts.longDescription: G major contains one sharp: F#. Notes are G A B C D E F#.
concepts.subject: Music

concepts.title: Rhythm Basics
concepts.shortDescription: Learn beats, measures, and note values.
concepts.longDescription: Start with the pulse, understand time signatures like 4/4, and read basic note values (quarter, half, whole).
concepts.subject: Music

concepts.title: Fractions Basics
concepts.shortDescription: Understand numerator, denominator, and simple equivalence.
concepts.longDescription: Learn how to interpret fractions, compare simple fractions, and understand equivalence like 1/2 = 2/4.
concepts.subject: Math
